publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Young] for R. Dawlman, at the signe of the Bible in Fleet-street neere the great Conduit,

notesStmt.note: "Three sermons, ad clerum", "Three sermons, ad magistratum", and "Three sermons ad populum" each has separate dated title page with "printed by R.Y." in imprint; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
